name: Lone Shark (Gravebuddy, Soyoungchoart, KumashovComposer)
description:
Welcome to Sandy Hollow! Population: 6(+you)

You're a lone shark who's just rolled in from the big smoke. Don't be a stranger now!

In this realistic and completely original "swipe your own adventure" game you can:

*** Make binary decisions for every life event! *** *** Meet and befriend colourful townsfolk! *** *** Connect with them through activities and meetups!*** *** Do nothing particularly Shark related! ***
Six whole buddies waiting for friendship! Bugs

The game is extremely buggy with features implemented but not working properly and whole dialog trees not triggering or out of order. We will update the build to bring it to it's full glory very soon!

There is an audio stuttering issue with the HTML5 build when using Chrome/Edge. This stems from a known issue in Godot.
For the best experience we recommend either Firefox or one of the download builds.

Credits

Made in 48 hrs for Wholesome Game Jam 2022

Team: Optimistic Rats

Programming, design and writing: @gravebud

Art: @soyoungchoart

Music and sound design: @kumashovcomposer

Icons retrieved from game-icons.net
